title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 August 2012 - XWiki
content:

13:02 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <vmassol> hello, I'm trying to debug something that's eluding me…. :)  
15:42 <vmassol> here's the code in case you have some idea:  
15:42 <vmassol> Enumeration<URL> urls = classLoader.getResources(location);  
15:42 <vmassol> while (urls.hasMoreElements()) {  
15:42 <vmassol>   URL url = urls.nextElement();  
15:42 <vmassol>   InputStream componentListStream = url.openStream();  
15:42 <vmassol> the error I geti s:  
15:42 <vmassol> Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: JAR entry META-INF/components.txt not found in /Users/vmassol/.m2/repository/org/xwiki/platform/xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-server/4.2-SNAPSHOT/xwiki-platform-wysiwyg-server-4.2-SNAPSHOT.jar  
15:42 <vmassol> but I don't see how that's possible since getResources returned it…. and META-INF/components.txt is indeed in the jar file...
